unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for sourcing fresh talent. We at Tata Steel, Jamshedpur, begin our drives on 10/10/2024. Focus areas include IIT Delhi and NIT Trichy. Packages starting at Rs. 8 Lakhs. Expecting applications by 25/09/2024. Interviews begin at 14:00 hrs. Hoping to find next-gen leaders for Bharat!
normalised: Campus hiring is crucial for sourcing fresh talent. We at T A T A Steel, Jamshedpur, begin our drives on tenth October two thousand and twenty four. Focus areas include I I T Delhi and N I T Trichy. Packages starting at rupee eight lakhs. Expecting applications by twenty fifth September two thousand and twenty four. Interviews begin at fourteen hundred hours. Hoping to find next-gen leaders for Bharat!
